metadata.title: ELSA-2012-0546:  php security update (CRITICAL)
metadata.description:
[5.3.3-3.8]
- correct detection of = in CVE-2012-1823 fix (#818607)

[5.3.3-3.7]
- add security fix for CVE-2012-1823 (#818607)
